content.title: Navigating to the Recipients Screen
content.body:
1. From the right pane of the Action Editor, under Add Condition set the following:
    • First field – Value.
    • Second field – Type Recipients.opstatus
    • Third field – Equals
    • Fourth field – Value
    • Fifth field - Type 0
  2. From the left pane of the Action Editor, under the General section, select Navigate to Form.
  3. From the right pane of the Action Editor, select frmDetails.
  4. From the right pane of the Action Editor, select Pass data with navigation.
    The Mapping Editor appears.
  5. From the Mapping Editor, expand frmEditRecipient > TextField-tbxPayeeID and select text{string}.
